word: H1589 - גָּנַב - gânab - gaw-nab' - Carry away

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - திருடுகளவு செய், கவர், இரகசியமாய் அறிவி, பறக்கடி, அடித்துக்கொள்
to steal, to steal away, to carry away
d) (Pual) to be stolen away, to be brought by stealth
e) (Hithpael) to go by stealth, to steal away
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to thieve (literally or figuratively); by implication to deceive: - carry away, X indeed, secretly bring, steal (away), get by stealth.
Cognate: H1589, H1590, H1591, H1592
